episode.title: Free Alcoholic Beverages
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Topics include Samsung getting pinched from Apple on the high end and Xiaomi (at least in China) on the low end, Android and the importance of software differentiation, wearable devices, and more.
episode.showNotes:
